Package halo.userinterface.gui.graphHandler

Provides for generation of plots and histograms.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GraphHandler Provides methods for the generation and handling of graphs created with JFreeChart.
HistogramConstructor Provides methods for the construction and handling of histograms.
XYGraphConstructor Class for the generation and displaying of an XY graph with JFreeChart Provides methods for generating a plot from a file, but also for direct adding of number pairs or a whole list of number pairs
 

Package halo.userinterface.gui.graphHandler Description

Provides for generation of plots and histograms.
